titleInfo.title: Letter from John Tod, Assistant Surgeon in Charge at Bushire to Robert Waite, Factory Master, Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a hole in the fabric of the folio that partially obscures the address of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the payment of bills for supplies for the Commissarial Department, and difficulties getting the merchants at Bushire to accept them due to mistakes made drawing them up. It specifically notes a problem with obtaining Spanish dollars and German crowns.
